/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that tower above. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, their glass facades reflecting the sunlight. Cars of various colors are scattered across the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
